headline.print_headline: U.S. Tax Season Returns, and With It Refund Fraud
headline.main: U.S. Tax Season Returns, and With It Refund Fraud

lead_paragraph: Kev Imandoust guards his U.S. Social Security number with 25-character passwords and email encryption software. But in 2012, the San Diego accountant became one of more than a million Americans whose identities were stolen to use for tax refund fraud.
